entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023
